roleset.name: be or come into contact with, literally or metpahorically

role.descr: touched with, if separate from agent

roles.note: Note that the instrument should ONLY be used when there is also anagent stated in the sentence--otherwise it gets too difficult todistinguish agent and instrument.

example.name: whack
example.text: Mary touched John lightly with a sledgehammer.

example.name: emotional touch
example.text: [John]-1 was deeply touched *trace*-1 by Mary's kind gesture.

example.name: be in contact
example.text: John's eyebrows touch in the center of his forehead.
example.arg: in the center of his forehead

example.name: nominal rel: touching
example.text: Maybe China hope to train hundreds of millions of corrupt officials to defeat the United States and recover the South China Sea successively , and if so , it is unilateral willingness just like such self touching as watching mental masturbation and meanwhile touching cock !
example.arg: [such][as watching mental masturbation and meanwhile touching cock]

roleset.note: Frames file for 'touch' based on sentences in financial subcorpus; nominal 'touching' based on BOLT-7. Comparison with hit and start. VN updated by Julia. Member of Vncls amuse-31.1, contiguous_location-47.8-1, relate-86.2-1, touch-20-1.

roleset.name: cause an effect by touching

example.name: certainly unusual reading
example.text: [*-1] Reaching for an old clay pot , relic of pioneer days , [he]-1 tore the envelope in pieces , [*-1] dropping them into it , [*-1] touching the little pyre to flame , watching it curl , the red sealing wax melting and bubbling in the feathery ash .

roleset.note: This sense is probably very very rare.

example.name: the only example in subcorpus
example.text: Nor do analysts expect the Sansui deal to touch off a fresh wave of foreign purchases.
example.arg: a fresh wave of foreign purchases

example.name: automatically generated
example.text: [A sizable supply of powder]-1 had been touched [*-1] off .

roleset.name: touch on: be/get involved with

example.name: don't touch me there!
example.text: The interview did not touch on Singapore's domestic affairs.

roleset.note: VN updated by Julia. Member of Vncls relate-86.2-1.

roleset.name: touch upon: same as touch on

example.name: silly English particles
example.text: And so I would only touch upon it now ( much as I have long wanted [*-1] to write a book about it ) .
example.arg: much as I have long wanted [*-1] to write a book about it

roleset.name: establish communication with someone abt smth

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: Peter just got back to me a min ago and said get the bottom one , can you touch base with him ASAP before I purchase it ?
